[Maestro's Instrument](/Equipment.aspx?ID=260)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 574 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A maestro’s instrument can be crafted in the form of any variety of handheld musical instrument. A maestro’s instrument grants you a +1 item bonus to Performance checks while playing music with the instrument.

<document level="2" id="action-166" />

**Craft Requirements** You must supply a casting of _charm_ of the appropriate level.
